org.xandercat.pmdb.service

Interface UserService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserServiceImpl

    public interface UserService

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deleteUser(String username)
      Delete a user from the system.
      Optional<PmdbUser> getUser(String username)
      Returns a user by username.
      Optional<PmdbUser> getUserByEmail(String email)
      Returns a user by email address.
      int getUserCount()
      Returns count of the number of users in the system, regardless of any status.
      boolean isAdministrator(String username)
      Returns whether or not the user with given username is considered an administrator.
      void registerUser(PmdbUser user, String newPassword)
      Register user.
      void saveMyAccountUser(PmdbUser user, String newPassword, String callingUsername)
      Save user from the My Account page.
      void saveUser(PmdbUser user, String newPassword, boolean newUser)
      Save user.
      List<PmdbUser> searchUsers(String searchString)
      Returns list of users whose usernames contain the provided search string.
      CloudUserSearchResults syncCloudUsers(List<PmdbUser> regularSearchResults, String searchString)
      Returns information on what users from the provided list are not in the cloud, and what users in the cloud matching the provided search string are not in the provided list.
      void syncUserFromCloud(String username)
      Copies a user from the cloud to PMDB.
      void syncUserToCloud(String username)
      Copies a user from PMDB to the cloud.
      void updateLastAccess(String username)
      Update the last access timestamp for a user to the current date.

    • Method Detail

      • getUser

        Optional<PmdbUser> getUser(String username)
        Returns a user by username. Returned user will not contain granted authorities information.
        Parameters:
        username - username
        Returns:
        user object for user (will not contain granted authorities)

      • getUserByEmail

        Optional<PmdbUser> getUserByEmail(String email)
        Returns a user by email address.
        Parameters:
        email - user email address
        Returns:
        user with provided email address, or null if user could not be determined

      • saveMyAccountUser

        void saveMyAccountUser(PmdbUser user,
                       String newPassword,
                       String callingUsername)
                throws PmdbException
        Save user from the My Account page. When saved through this method, additional validation is performed to ensure user is authentic and no administrator properties have been changed.
        Parameters:
        user - user
        newPassword - new password; leave null/empty if password should not be changed
        callingUsername - calling username
        Throws:
        PmdbException - if any errors occur

      • saveUser

        void saveUser(PmdbUser user,
              String newPassword,
              boolean newUser)
       throws PmdbException
        Save user.
        Parameters:
        user - user to save
        newPassword - new password; leave null/empty if password should not be changed
        newUser - whether or not this is a new user
        Throws:
        PmdbException - if any errors occur

      • registerUser

        void registerUser(PmdbUser user,
                  String newPassword)
           throws PmdbException,
                  BandwidthException
        Register user.
        Parameters:
        user - user to register
        newPassword - new password
        Throws:
        PmdbException - if any errors occur
        BandwidthException - if too many user registrations in short period of time

      • updateLastAccess

        void updateLastAccess(String username)
        Update the last access timestamp for a user to the current date. Call this when a user logs in.
        Parameters:
        username - username of user

      • getUserCount

        int getUserCount()
        Returns count of the number of users in the system, regardless of any status.
        Returns:
        number of users in the system

      • searchUsers

        List<PmdbUser> searchUsers(String searchString)
        Returns list of users whose usernames contain the provided search string. Search is case insensitive.
        Parameters:
        searchString - search string
        Returns:
        list of users matching search string

      • isAdministrator

        boolean isAdministrator(String username)
        Returns whether or not the user with given username is considered an administrator.
        Parameters:
        username - username
        Returns:
        whether or not the user with given username is considered an administrator

      • syncCloudUsers

        CloudUserSearchResults syncCloudUsers(List<PmdbUser> regularSearchResults,
                                      String searchString)
        Returns information on what users from the provided list are not in the cloud, and what users in the cloud matching the provided search string are not in the provided list.
        Parameters:
        regularSearchResults - list of users to check against
        searchString - search string used to collect the list of users
        Returns:
        information on users who are only in the cloud or only not in the cloud.

      • syncUserToCloud

        void syncUserToCloud(String username)
              throws WebServicesException
        Copies a user from PMDB to the cloud. User should not already be in the cloud when calling this method.
        Parameters:
        username - username
        Throws:
        WebServicesException - if there are any web service failures

      • syncUserFromCloud

        void syncUserFromCloud(String username)
                throws PmdbException,
                       WebServicesException
        Copies a user from the cloud to PMDB. User should not already be in PMDB when calling this method. Created user will not be enabled and will not have any user details set.
        Parameters:
        username - username
        Throws:
        PmdbException - if any errors occur
        WebServicesException - if there are any web service failures

      • deleteUser

        void deleteUser(String username)
         throws PmdbException
        Delete a user from the system. By design, this should only be called for users who have never logged in. If user has logged in before, an exception will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        username - username
        Throws:
        PmdbException - if an error occurs
